definition: not caring about fame and fortune (idiom)/indifferent to worldly rewards
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
lake/Taiwan pr. [bo2]

name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: If you can not fame and fortune, you can not make a clear ambition.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不能淡泊名利，就無法使志向明確。

sentences.english: He is always morally pure and indifferent to fame and fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他從來都是這樣淡泊名利，一片冰心。
